name: Boruto Inu
description: Boruto Inu's adventures led them to in the deep realms of The Cryptoverse. They have now set their goal in conquering the Legendary Ethereum Village and, ultimately, defeating the Gwei. Boruto Inu is an Anime coin with development of a NFT marketplace. NFTs will be minted and sold using the Boruto Inu coin. Boruto Inu aims to the protect the Hidden Ethereum Village from the evil plans of the GWEI!
